# Class fields RFCCode.RFCClass_category=Category RFCCode.RFCClass_category_informational=Informational RFCCode.RFCClass_category_bcp=Best current practice RFCCode.RFCClass_category_experimental=Experimental RFCCode.RFCClass_status=Status RFCCode.RFCClass_status_final=Final RFCCode.RFCClass_status_draft=Draft RFCCode.RFCClass_abstract=Abstract RFCCode.RFCClass_content=Content RFCCode.RFCClass_obsoletes=Obsoletes RFCCode.RFCClass_additionalAuthors=Additional Authors
# Live table generic keys rfc.livetable.doc.title=Title rfc.livetable.doc.name=Page name rfc.livetable.doc.space=Space rfc.livetable.doc.fullname=Page full name rfc.livetable.doc.author=Last Author rfc.livetable.doc.creator=Creator rfc.livetable.doc.date=Update date rfc.livetable.doc.creationDate=Creation date rfc.livetable._avatar=Avatar rfc.livetable._images=Images rfc.livetable._attachments=Attachments rfc.livetable._actions=Actions rfc.livetable._actions.edit=Edit rfc.livetable._actions.delete=Delete rfc.livetable.emptyvalue=-
